title: How to Install a High Resolution Patch to Fallout 1 from Steam

steps.headline: Download both files:
steps.description:
High Resolution Patch(http://www.nma-fallout.com/resources/fallout-1-high-res-patch.52/) This is called call this "HRPATCH" from now on{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/58/Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/5/58/Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet1.jpg/aid2202821-v4-728px-Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Patch you need to be able to use the High Resolution Patch(http://teamx.ru/site_arc/patches/fallup-1.2.1-EN-RC.rar) I call this "PATCH" from now on{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/14/Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/1/14/Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet2.jpg/aid2202821-v4-728px-Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"}

steps.headline: Open PATCH with a program capable of opening a .rar file(WinRAR is good)

Extract the contents of PATCH to your Fallout 1 folder(Usually C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\fallout (64-bit Windows), or C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\fallout (32-bit Windows))
Click "Yes" to all of the windows that are popping up
Extract the contents of HRPATCH to a folder(your choice)
Open the folder you extracted HRPATCH and open "Fallout1_High_Resolution_Patch_3.06.exe"
Press the button with just dots on it.
steps.description: Find your Fallout 1 folder which usually is C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\fallout (64-bit Windows), or C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\fallout (32-bit Windows)

steps.headline: Open your Fallout 1 folder and locate "f1_res_patcher.exe".
steps.description: Open it and press yes/OK till you get a message saying Fallout has been patched

steps.headline: Start Fallout and chose your desired resolution and color depth

text:
Download both files: High Resolution Patch(http://www.nma-fallout.com/resources/fallout-1-high-res-patch.52/) This is called call this "HRPATCH" from now on{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/58/Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet1.jpg/v4-460px-Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/5/58/Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet1.jpg/aid2202821-v4-728px-Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

"} Patch you need to be able to use the High Resolution Patch(http://teamx.ru/site_arc/patches/fallup-1.2.1-EN-RC.rar) I call this "PATCH" from now on{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/14/Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet2.jpg/v4-460px-Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet2.jpg","bigUrl":"/images/thumb/1/14/Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet2.jpg/aid2202821-v4-728px-Install-a-High-Resolution-Patch-to-Fallout-1-from-Steam-Step-1Bullet2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Open PATCH with a program capable of opening a .rar file(WinRAR is good) Extract the contents of PATCH to your Fallout 1 folder(Usually C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common allout (64-bit Windows), or C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common allout (32-bit Windows)) Click "Yes" to all of the windows that are popping up Extract the contents of HRPATCH to a folder(your choice) Open the folder you extracted HRPATCH and open "Fallout1_High_Resolution_Patch_3.06.exe" Press the button with just dots on it. Find your Fallout 1 folder which usually is C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common allout (64-bit Windows), or C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common allout (32-bit Windows) Press extract Open your Fallout 1 folder and locate "f1_res_patcher.exe". Open it and press yes/OK till you get a message saying Fallout has been patched Start Fallout and chose your desired resolution and color depth Enjoy!
